headline: Workday Inc. (WDAY) Finalizes Its Acquisition of Paradox
summary: Third Point Management holds $72,000,000 worth of Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ:WDAY) shares, representing 0.94% of its portfolio. The stock is included in our list of Billionaire Dan Loeb’s 10 Stocks with Huge Upside Potential. Workday Inc. (NASDAQ:WDAY) finalized its acquisition of Paradox on October 1, 2025. Paradox is a conversational AI hiring platform designed to streamline […]
